header.title: What is Onyx Protocol?
header.title-2: A Simple and Transparent Rebase Stablecoin System
header.description-1: This protocol allows anyone to mint tokens by locking collateral worth 200% of the token value.
header.description-2: Every token in circulation is backed by more value than it represents.

1-block.title: No banks.
1-block.description: Lock collateral worth 200% Mint new tokens instantly Use them anywhere like a stablecoin.

2-block.title: No hidden risks.
2-block.description: Each position has a health score. If collateral value drops too low, the position becomes unsafe.

3-block.title: Just smart contracts and clear rules.

description.header: When positions become unsafe, they can be liquidated.

questions.about-clarity: Why can I trust Onyx Protocol?

about-rebase.title: This is a rebase token.
about-rebase.1: Your number of tokens may change over time. But your share of the system stays the same.
about-rebase.2: You don’t lose your position. You keep your proportional ownership.
about-rebase.3: This keeps the system flexible and stable at the same time.

about-overcollateral.title: Overcollateralized for Safety
about-overcollateral.1: Every token is backed by twice its value in collateral.
about-overcollateral.2: This creates a safety buffer during market volatility.
about-overcollateral.3: The protocol doesn’t rely on trust. It relies on math.

about-clarity.title: Built for Clarity
about-clarity.1: Transparent smart contracts Fully on-chain logic Clear collateral rules No centralized control
about-clarity.2: Everything happens automatically. Everything is verifiable.

end-section.title: Take part in a stable and transparent system.
